title.rendered: How to Manually Add a Shared Mailbox in Outlook

excerpt.rendered: In this tutorial video will show you how to manually add a shared mailbox within Outlook! Under most normal circumstances when using Office 365, when you’re assigned access to a shared mailbox it will appear automatically within Outlook without any required actions from you.
